ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: tho i ve heard of a few instances where items can be gotten from doing a quest or just killing the person who gives the quest...so possibly we aren t supposed
ygData.messageBody:
tho i've heard of a few instances where items can be gotten from doing a
quest or just killing the person who gives the quest...so possibly we aren't
supposed to kill any good gnomes, but it would work anyway...
Xillitil/Povar


>I highly doubt that the third book or even any tinkering info would be
>found
>from killing gnomes.Why would we have to kill our own to get something for
>a
>gnome only skill.that would mean taking faction hits just to get something
>that a gnome should have .But thats just my opinion, so im not going out
>killing any gnomes for it.I think that you are looking in the wrong place
>by
>doing that

>Xalumkin of Bertoxx
